text:
Jof Davies engineered MTDCNC’s email infrastructure, delivering approximately one million emails per month.

Responsibilities include:
- Building reusable HTML templates with VML compatibility for Outlook.
- Ensuring responsive behaviour across mobile and desktop clients.
- Implementing fallbacks for legacy mail clients.
- Maintaining SPF, DKIM, DMARC, blacklist and MX reputation compliance.
- Automating list hygiene, segmentation, suppression, and tagging.
- Producing engagement analysis through dedicated reporting.

HTML email development remains one of Jof’s strongest technical domains.
